name: day of the dead hand painted bag
description:
The mexican artists were using mixed media, and I hope to move toward more figurines and hand made furniture. I traveled all over mexico looking for just the right style of work and tried to combine all the styles with my own to create the look you are seeing here This bag has an inner made of silk like material, and has a cell phone pocket inside as well as a handy inside zipper pocket.This bag is one of a kind and no 2 are alike.Own this hand painted piece of art.

This cool bowler style bag is easy to maintain and measures approximately 14"W and 8.5" H and the bag has short straps so you can tote it or throw it on your shoulder.

check out all all our other day of the dead merch and scary bags right here!

name: black hand painted day of the dead bag
description:
I traveled all over mexico looking for just the right style of work and tried to combine all the styles with my own to create the look you are seeing here, this particular bag was purchased recently by the actress Heather Langenkamp the main character in the first "nightmare on Elm street "movie, she said it was her only purchase while in Miami,she loved the hand painted quality and was very impressed with it's craftsmanship, this bag is made to order so it will differ very slightly from the picture and it will be signed and numbered.This highly detailed bag is made of patent leather and has a cell phone pocket located inside, it also has a zipper pocket inside and is lined with satin. This handbag is one of a kind no 2 are alike! This is a bowler style handbag , which is all the rage right now and it is hand painted and beautifully detailed.

This cool bowler style bag is easy to maintain and measures approximately 14"W and 8.5" H and the bag has short straps so you can tote it or throw it on your shoulder.The drop from the top of strap to the top of the bag is 6.5"

check out all all our other day of the dead merch and scary bags right here!

name: day of the dead black magic hand painted bag
description:
This design is an interpretation of a mexican folk art scene, beautifully done and is one of a kind no 2 are the same.On the inside this bag has a cell phone pocket and a zipper pocket as well. This is must have for fashionistas no one else will be able to get one.

This cool bowler style bag is easy to maintain and measures approximately 14"W and 8.5" H and the bag has short straps so you can tote it or throw it on your shoulder.

check out all all our other day of the dead merch and scary bags right here!

name: Frankensteins tomb hand painted and finished cigar box purse
description: This hand painted bag is decorated on all surfaces , on the top front, frankensteins  face is expertly depicted and sealed for years of use. The inside of the bag is adorned with a mirror to check out you make up in a flash, the back of the bag is finalized with frank walking away with his future bride.this numbered signed edition is one of a kind hand painted and a absolute must have for halloween fanatics! measuring 8"wide and 9 " high this purse is very detailed and lined with red felt!Frank has been through a lot and his tomb purse tells the story in a brilliant pictoral. The handle has been bolted on for durability!this bag/box has been clear coated to protect it for years to come.
